local_intent: Confirm and align to the red object, execute a straight 0.15 m push toward 270 deg with one automatic retry if needed, then retreat and briefly wait, verifying the object remains visible.
assumptions: 270 degrees corresponds to pushing toward the table's near edge
Camera maintains visibility of the red object after the push
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence of scan, visibility check, precise approach, push, retreat, and wait; adds a Retry on Push for recovery and a final visibility check consistent with task goals.
